question: Show tourist attractions and local markets in London.
sql_query1:
SELECT Tourist_Attractions.name
FROM Tourist_Attractions
WHERE Tourist_Attractions.Location = "London"
UNION
SELECT Local_Markets.name
FROM Local_Markets
WHERE Local_Markets.Location = "London"
sql_query2:
SELECT Tourist_Attractions.name
FROM Tourist_Attractions
UNION
SELECT Local_Markets.name
FROM Local_Markets
WHERE Local_Markets.Location = "London"
interpretation1: What tourist attractions are in London and what local markets are in the same location?
interpretation2: Provide a list of all tourist attractions and also provide a list of local markets in London.
